item.description: This is great fun for everyone. Feel free to take children if you would like. (It's only $2.00 for children)There is free parking at the Newport Convention Center across the street. Show your baseball ticket when you leave the parking lot. Bring warm clothing for later in the evening.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in front of Mudville Pub to the right of the main entrance if you are facing the main entrance.
item.why: To see if the Irish cheering section will return and to watch young children chase a very large gull around the field. The local team needs your $4.00.
item.name: Take Me Out To The Ball Game (Go Gulls!)
